author: Pam Key, Pam Key
title: ABC’s Raddatz to Kudlow: 'Why Should People Trust You' After You Downplayed Coronavirus?
description: Sunday on ABC's "This Week," guest host Martha Raddatz asked White House economic advisor Larry Kudlow how he could be trusted now on the coronavirus pandemic given on February 25, he said, "We have contained this." | Clips
content: Sunday on ABC’s “This Week,” guest host Martha Raddatz asked White House economic advisor Larry Kudlow how he could be trusted now on the coronavirus pandemic given on February 25, he said, “We have contained this.”KUDLOW: Well, listen, I say that weeks, it c… [+1911 chars]
